name: ​EditCapability

fields.name: isEditable​ByMeUrl
fields.description: The URL to check if the context user is able to edit

fields.name: lastEditedBy
fields.description: Who last edited this feed element or

fields.name: lastEditedDate
fields.description: The most recent edit date of this feed element or

fields.name: latestRevision
fields.description: The most recent revision of this feed element or

fields.name: relativeLast​EditedDate
fields.description: Relative last edited date, for example, “2h

description: If a feed element or comment has this capability, users who have permission can edit it.
